chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! I'm the navigator. Where should I start on the map?
where the map begins
Great! At the starting point of the map, I see a wide expanse of land with various paths leading in different directions. Can you please tell me which direction to go first?
move along to the next island

Thank you for the instruction. Moving along from the starting point, I see a path leading to the left. It takes me to a small island. On this island, I can see a tiger. What would you like me to do next?
try to outsmart the tiger and move to the next island with the parot

Understood! I'll try my best to outsmart the tiger and move towards the island with the parrot. Moving cautiously, I leave the small island and head southeast, carefully avoiding the tiger. As I reach the next island, I can see a beautiful parrot sitting on a tree. What's the next step?
the next step is the next island with the frog then move on to the island with the giraffe

Got it! Leaving the island with the parrot behind, I head southwest. Following the path, I reach another big island. On this island, I see a tree with a frog sitting on it. To continue, should I go left from the frog to the island with the giraffe?
yes left
Perfect! Leaving the frog behind, I make my way left and arrive at the next island. Here, I spot a magnificent giraffe. Which direction should I head next?
next to the island with snake where the treasure is located

Alright! Moving southeast from the island with the giraffe, I continue my journey and reach the next island. On this island, I see a snake. Two steps to the east of the snake, lies the treasure. 

Congratulations! We have successfully reached the treasure. *Finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Welcome to the map navigation game. Are you ready to start following the path?
yes please
Great! Let's begin. Look around and describe what you see near the top-right corner of the map where the white dog is sitting.
i see a wooden bench
Good observation! Now, I want you to take a few steps to the left (west) from the white dog, passing below the wooden bench. Let me know when you're there.
i am
Wonderful! Now, from where you are, can you see a florist stand nearby? Describe what you see and if you see the stand or not.
i see a bridge
Oops, seems like we missed a step. Let's backtrack a bit. From where you are, go back to the trail and cross it heading towards the white dog again. Let me know when you're back at the white dog.
i am
Great! Now that you're back at the white dog, take a look around and describe what you see near the dog. Is there anything interesting nearby?
a wooden bench
Perfect! Now, I want you to head south from the white dog and cross over a wooden branch that is crossing a river. Let me know when you've crossed the branch.
i am there and i see another dog trying to have a picnic

Well done! You've crossed the branch and spotted the dog and the picnic. Now, I want you to walk over the picnic mat, being careful not to disturb anything, and continue your journey towards the west. Let me know when you're heading west.
i am
Great progress! Now, ahead of you, there's another wooden branch crossing the river. I want you to cross over that branch, this time heading north. Let me know once you've crossed the river.
i have

Excellent! You're doing a fantastic job. Now, after crossing the river, you'll see a green bush. Rather than touching the bush, I want you to circle around it from the right side. Keep going until you reach the florist stand. Let me know when you're near the stand.
i am near iy

Fantastic! You're almost there. Now, make a left turn (west) and go below the florist stand. Keep going until you reach a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Let me know when you're at the bridge.
i am there
Great job! You're making excellent progress. Just past the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench and reading newspapers. Take a moment to observe and describe what you see.
i see branch next to them

Very observant! Now, I want you to take a few steps south, passing between the two elderly people and the wooden branch. As you continue south, you'll see a green bush near the end of the branch. Let me know when you're next to the green bush.
i am there

Wonderful! You're almost at the final destination. Now, I want you to head east, between the wooden branch and the green bush. Keep going in that direction until you reach the next landmark. Let me know when you're heading east.
i am
Great progress! Now, just a few steps to the east, you'll come across a brown young deer. Congratulations, you've reached your final objective! Well done!
thank you

You're very welcome! You did a fantastic job navigating the map and following the instructions. I hope you enjoyed the game. If you'd like to play again or have any other questions, feel free to let me know. Have a great day!
you too
Thank you! Take care and have a wonderful day ahead!

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello.. nice landscape
Thank you! It's a beautiful landscape indeed. I am currently at the north of the map, next to a tent. What would you like me to do next?
get out of the tent and come close to the dog
Okay, I've left the tent and I'm now close to the dog. What should I do next?
follow the road to the bonfire and get to the mushrooms
Got it! I will follow the road south to the bonfire. I have reached the bonfire, and to its right, I can see the red mushrooms. What would you like me to do next?
move to the vehicle and take it along the road to the next destination where the telescope is located.

Perfect! I will head to the vehicle and continue along the road to the next destination. I have reached the blue car and I'm now driving it south along the road. I see a blue telescope coming up on the path. What's the next step?
try to scrutinize the telescope for a while. And when done, I then move to the next destination which looks like a nice wooden cabin surrounded by rocks.

Sure thing! I will spend some time examining the telescope. After that, I will make my way to the wooden cabin surrounded by rocks. 

I'm done examining the telescope and now I'm heading west towards the wooden cabin. I can see the rocks surrounding the cabin. What's the next move?
thats our destination. We can now move in and settle down.

Great! I have reached the wooden cabin surrounded by rocks. It seems like we have finally arrived at our destination. I will now enter the cabin and settle down. 

*Finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
beautiful landscape
Yes, the landscape is quite beautiful. We are starting near a group of three palm trees. Can you see them?
yes please
Great! Now I want you to go under the first tree and then turn right. Keep going until you reach the second palm tree. Let me know when you're there.
i am there
Good job! Now, before the third tree, make a sharp left turn. Start heading south and let me know what you see along the way.
a dog
That's right! You've encountered a brown puppy. Well done! Now, take a slight left turn and then a right turn towards the south. Keep going and tell me what you come across next.
i see and a tent and a sound speaker

Excellent! You're doing great. Take a moment to appreciate the red tent on your left and the larger speaker on your right. Now, veer slightly to the left and head towards the north-west. Let me know what you find as you continue on this path.
i see a beach ball
Great job! You've spotted a blue-yellow-white beach ball. Now, continue north but make sure to pass between the beach ball and the medium-sized rock. Let me know when you've made it through.
i am there

Well done! You're making fantastic progress. Now, I want you to make a sharp right turn and head back to the land. Keep going until you come across a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Describe what you see as you approach them.
i see a kayak
i see a kayak
Excellent! You've spotted a red kayak. Almost there! Now, make a quick right turn and head towards the west. Proceed below the kayak and let me know when you've reached it.
i see a rock and a shark
Great observation! You're doing really well. Now, I want you to make a sharp right turn away from the shark. Continue on the path and let me know what you see next.
a crab
Correct! You've encountered a large red crab. Well done for maneuvering away from the shark. Now, continue along the path and tell me what you find after the crab.

general_survey.answer: I think they are intelligent and articulate.
